columns.Furniture_ID: The unique identifier for each piece of furniture.
columns.Name: The name of the furniture item.
columns.Num_of_Component: The total number of components in the furniture.
columns.Market_Rate: The market price of the furniture item.

furniture.table_description: The table holds information about different furniture items.

columns.Manufacturer_ID: The unique identifier for each manufacturer.
columns.Open_Year: The year the manufacturer was established.
columns.Name: The name of the manufacturing company.
columns.Num_of_Factories: The total number of factories owned by the manufacturer.
columns.Num_of_Shops: The total number of retail shops owned by the manufacturer.

manufacturer.table_description: The table holds information about various manufacturers.

columns.Manufacturer_ID: The unique identifier for each manufacturer associated with furniture.
columns.Furniture_ID: The unique identifier for each piece of furniture manufactured.
columns.Price_in_Dollar: The price of the furniture item in US dollars.

furniture_manufacte.table_description: The table links furniture items to their respective manufacturers and pricing.
